mapper.select: SELECT SUM(amount) AS amount,amountType FROM t_user_asset WHERE openId = #{openId} AND amountType = '0' AND deltFlag = '1';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS amount FROM t_user_asset WHERE amountType = '0' AND openId = #{openId} AND deltFlag != '0';

SELECT a.id AS amountId,a.openId,a.amount,a.amountType,a.editTime,a.deltFlag AS deletFlag,b.nickName,b.userId FROM t_user_asset a LEFT JOIN t_user_info b ON b.openId = a.openId WHERE a.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY a.editTime DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{pageSize};
SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) FROM t_user_asset WHERE userId = #{userId} AND deltFlag = '1' AND amountType = '0';
